title: Reconstruction Algorithms for Low-Rank Tensors and Depth-3 Multilinear Circuits.
abstract:
Abstract
We give new and efficient black-box reconstruction algorithms for some classes of depth-333 arithmetic circuits. As a consequence, we obtain the first efficient algorithm for computing the tensor rank and for finding the optimal tensor decomposition as a sum of rank-one tensors when then input is a constant-rank tensor.
